a = int(input())
b = int(input())
area = a * b
peri = 2 * (a + b)
if area > peri:
    print('Area')
    print(area)
elif peri > area:
    print('Peri')
    print(peri)
else:
    print('Eq')
    print(area)

l = int(input())
b = int(input())
a = l * b
p = 2 * l + 2 * b
if a > p:
    print('Area')
    print(a)
elif a == p:
    print('Eq')
    print(a)
else:
    print('Peri')
    print(p)
